AmazonS3::get_bucket_list ( $  pcre = null  ) 

Get Bucket List

ONLY lists the bucket names on the S3 account.

public

Parameters:
string $pcre (Optional) A Perl-Compatible Regular Expression (PCRE) to filter the bucket names against.
Returns:
TarzanHTTPResponse
